insert into t_supervisor (id, time, name, reality_name, mobile, password, lock_status, login_count, last_login_time, last_login_ip, creater_id, ukey ) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lockStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{loginCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastLoginIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createrId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{ukey,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update t_supervisor set time = #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reality_name = #{realityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lock_status = #{lockStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, login_count = #{loginCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, last_login_time = #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_login_ip = #{lastLoginIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creater_id = #{createrId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ukey = #{ukey,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, time, name, reality_name, mobile, password, lock_status, login_count, last_login_time, last_login_ip, creater_id, ukey from t_supervisor where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
